      Power Fail.
      class  PrimaryPowerFail
      Primary power fail lasts 3 turns.
      class  SecondaryPowerFail
      Secondary power failure lasts for 2 actions.
      class  TertiaryPowerFail
      Tertiary power failure lasts for 1 action and doesn't have any children.
